person.name: Seth Easter
person.short_description: American production designer and creative director
person.headline: Senior Production Designer, ABC News & ABC Daytime | Emmy-winning Art Director | Experiential & Broadcast Environments

summary.overview: American production designer and creative director best known for two decades of work for ABC News and ABC Daytime, leading the design of high-visibility, LED-forward, video-as-scenery broadcast environments, election-night headquarters and multi-show studio systems in Disney’s Hudson Square complex. Emmy-winning art director on the 65th Tony Awards and credited on multiple Tony broadcasts. Proven record delivering on immovable, news-cycle timelines while keeping visual identity consistent across flagship programs. (Sources: IMDb, Television Academy, NewscastStudio, 2024–2025 trade coverage.)
key_themes: Video-forward, LED-centric scenic design for news and live events
Modular, multi-show, AR-capable studios for rapid redress
Network-level facility migrations (Disney Hudson Square, NY)
Collaboration with lighting, AV/integration and editorial teams
Cross-over from broadcast to experiential/brand environments

experience.title: Senior Production Designer, ABC News & ABC Daytime
highlights: Lead production designer credited with keeping visual identity consistent across ABC’s move into Disney’s Hudson Square facility, including shows such as “Good Morning America” (Studio C), “World News Tonight,” “The View,” and overnight/daytime news formats.  [oai_citation:0‡NewscastStudio](https://www.newscaststudio.com/designers/seth-easter-design/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

Spearheaded the 2020+ overhaul of Studio TV3, delivering a wraparound, LED-heavy, AR-capable studio ahead of the U.S. election cycle; coordinated scenic, lighting and AV teams.  [oai_citation:1‡IMDb](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3267837/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

Designed election-night environments (2024) with embedded touchscreens, expanded presenter interactivity and re-envisioned desk/talent layouts for fast graphics integration.  [oai_citation:2‡IMDb](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3267837/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

Debate-stage design for ABC’s U.S. presidential debates, integrating LED, typography and show-brand lighting into a dark, candidate-first scenic treatment.  [oai_citation:3‡NewscastStudio](https://www.newscaststudio.com/designers/seth-easter-design/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

Ongoing responsibility for flexible, multi-show scenic language (movable “air walls,” shared LED architecture) reused in smaller Hudson Square studios.  [oai_citation:4‡NewscastStudio](https://www.newscaststudio.com/designers/seth-easter-design/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

experience.title: Founder / Principal
highlights: Independent production-design practice focused on live and broadcast entertainment, political events and televised specials.  [oai_citation:5‡NewscastStudio](https://www.newscaststudio.com/designers/seth-easter-design/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)
Known for bringing broadcast technologies (large LED, video floors, AR-ready layouts) into entertainment settings.
Engaged by networks and producers for high-pressure, fixed-date events.
